subject: This Week’s “Major Crypto Drivers in the Weeks Ahead” – July 7, 2025
body:
**Overview**

With historically strong seasonality following July 4 and growing optimism around pro-crypto legislation expected next week in the U.S., Bitcoin appears well-positioned to reach a new all-time high in the coming two weeks. Next week’s CPI report could further reinforce this bullish setup—if inflation remains contained, it may provide an additional tailwind for Bitcoin’s rally.
